extendLockedUntilModal.mentorLockExpirin:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the modal indicating a mentor lock is about to expire
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Request (Modal title)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor's lock on a request is about to expire
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Mentor Lock close to expiring"
extendLockedUntilModal.timeRemaining:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text showing remaining time before a request is unlocked
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Request (Modal body)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor's lock on a request is about to expire
**Technical Context**: The variable `diffMinutes` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "You only have {diffMinutes} remaining to submit your comment before this mentor request is unlocked for other mentors to reply to."
extendLockedUntilModal.wouldLikeMoreTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Question asking if the user wants to extend the lock time
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Request (Modal body)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor's lock on a request is about to expire
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Would you like more time?"
extendLockedUntilModal.yesExtend:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to confirm extending the mentor lock
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Request (Modal action button)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor is prompted to extend their lock on a request
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Yes, extend for 30 minutes"
extendLockedUntilModal.noThankYou:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to decline extending the mentor lock
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Request (Modal action button)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor is prompted to extend their lock on a request
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "No, thank you"
